title: Gray langur
summary: Gray langurs, also called Hanuman langurs or Hanuman monkeys, are Old World monkeys native to the Indian subcontinent constituting the genus Semnopithecus.[1] Traditionally only one species Semnopithecus entellus was recognized, but since about 2001, additional species have been recognized.  The taxonomy has been in flux, but currently eight species are recognized.
